data.actual_result: The text tries to continue eventually getting cut off.
data.expected_result: The text in the box is followed by 3 dots when it reaches the max number of characters it can show.
data.short_description: The default text (Search in <insert server name here>) in the search isn't followed by 3 dots when the text crosses the max number of characters it can show. The text tries to continue eventually getting cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server with a long name like `WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW` . - Click on search. - Observe the default text in the text box.
